text: The 2019 Ballon d'Or was the 64th annual ceremony of the Ballon d'Or, presented by France Football, and recognising the best footballers in the world for 2019. Lionel Messi won the men's award for a record sixth time in his career. ==Ballon d'Or== The nominees for the awards were announced on 6 November 2019. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" !Rank !Player !Club(s) !Points |- style="background-color: #FFF68F;
